name: 交叉碼：李的偉大的冒險到神秘的森林 (Bootleg CrossCode)
name_original: 交叉碼：李的偉大的冒險到神秘的森林 (Bootleg CrossCode)
description:
This was done as a big ol' joke in 2018. There's not a whole lot to do. 

This'll probably never get finished. Sorry :(

R - Attack/Confirm
F - Cancel
Enter - Start/Menu
WASD - Move
Can also be played with a gamepad.

All rights to CrossCode belong to my good friends at RadicalFishGames. Support their game!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/368340/CrossCode/
